name: Street Reigns
description:
Ready... Fight! No, wait...

1. First of all, remember your past, your master's lessons...

2. Choose wisely in order to increase your power

3. Beat your enemy!

This games was developed during Game Developer League's May Jam, which theme was to take a classic and give it a twist. We took Street Fighter and added a flashback fase, that works like Reigns, and affects the power of your skills.

Attack's effectiveness is based on a paper/scissor/stone mechanic.

It's time to show your skills: choose, fight and enjoy.
